thread.title: VIDEO: Boston group hopes to show community has More in Common as part of nationwide project
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Boston group hopes to show community has More in Common as part of nationwide project

title: VIDEO: Boston group hopes to show community has More in Common as part of nationwide project
text: Lifestyle VIDEO: Boston group hopes to show community has More in Common as part of nationwide project Sorry, we're having problems with our video player at the moment, but are working to fix it as soon as we can Waiting for Video... 08:24 Wednesday 19 October 2016 More in Common is part of a nationwide project organised by Hope Not Hate Brixton has the highest number of remainers in the UK with 78.6 per cent. Boston had the highest leave vote with 75.6 per cent. Funding for the project comes from the Jo Cox Memorial Fund, set up after the remain MP was killed ahead of the Brexit vote.
